creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: horizontal stripes with irregular edges; alternate between light magenta and red with silver overlap; light grey irregular edges distinguish the red/silver from magenta
inscription: Bottom, in pencil: [線による作品  I-CGS] {Sen ni yoru sakuhin I-CGS} [a.p.] [Ayomi \'80]
title: Linear Composition I-CGS
